column4: People, i've got a problem here. My ubuntu don't navigate the web. The configuration is correct. I navigate using windows and the same IP configurations, but with ubuntu I can't...
can you open a terminal and type 'ping 64.233.187.99' ?
do you get a response? how about if you plug that ip into the browser?
I've got a response even I try ping google.com
so it can resolve dns in terminal but firefox doesnt work..
Not only in firefox, but with epiphany too
But I can conect to gtalk service using pidgin
boss walks by i have to be busy ;p
I don't know why gutsy set it to 1500
I down it to 1492 and works again
